title: A way to spice up pentakills
body:
Have it to where the champ you are playing as will comment on the progress towards the penta. If you get a quad, and then miss the penta, they'll get annoyed and say something along the lines of, "Maybe Next Time", in their own unique ways. If you GET the penta, they'll celebrate in their own unique way.

If anybody comes up with anything, put it in the comments!

Edit 1: Holy smokes; I did not expect this to get so much attention, keep the ideas coming guys!!!
